patthana8.34:4.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:4.2: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:4.3: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.34:5.1: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:5.2: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:5.3: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.34:6.1: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:6.2: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:6.3: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.34:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
